question: For each, tell me how much confidence you have in each leader to do the right thing regarding world affairs – a lot of confidence, some confidence, not too much confidence, or no confidence at all. a. U.S. President Joe Biden
raw_output:
I have some confidence in President Biden's ability to do the right thing regarding world affairs. He has experience and has shown a steady approach to international issues, though some may feel unsure about his decisions in complex scenarios. Therefore, I believe he has a moderate level of trust based on his diplomatic efforts and policy consistency.

ANSWER: B
